name: Duck Hunt 56 In Space
description:
WASD to move, mouse to aim and mouse left button to shoot. U got three lives, don't die and kill as many alien ducks as you can. But above all else have fun. 

Story - Your alien hunter, you're tired of hunting on earth so you travel to a far away planet to hunt the ULIMATE GAME...!!! Alien ducks, but these don't go down as easy as they do on earth. This might be the hunt of your life time. 

This is my second game jam and I'm really enjoying making games, all feedback is apricated, especially with the face I'll be going back to work on this game after the jam, to keep up with what I'm going to do with it here a link to my yt channel... https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_KIARM9lI9evSI3JIDHkUg?view_as=subscriber
